thread.title: Trump says his father gave him a 'small' $1 million loan
thread.title_full: Trump says his father gave him a 'small' $1 million loan - US News

author: USNews
title: Trump says his father gave him a 'small' $1 million loan
text:
Donald Trump says life hasn't been easy, started with a 'small' $1 million loan from his dad Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump autographs a book on his way out after speaking at a town hall meeting at the Atkinson Country Club in Atkinson, N.H., Monday, Oct. 26, 2015. (AP Photo/Cheryl Senter)
Associated Press Oct. 26, 2015 | 12:19 p.m. EDT + More ATKINSON, N.H. (AP) — If you had any doubts, Donald Trump is making it clear that his start in life was different from the average voter's.
Trump says early in his career he got some help from his father — which he described as "a small loan of $1 million."
Trump was speaking at a town hall event on NBC's "Today" show Monday. The leading Republican presidential candidate and billionaire businessman was asked whether, with the exception of his family, he'd ever been told "no."
Trump says all of his life he's been told "no" and he "fought through it" to build his real estate empire.
As for help from his real estate developer father, Trump says he had to pay back that million-dollar loan with interest.
